++ Desensitizing

Desensitizing (DS) is where DirectedLogic is removed to increase performance at the cost of interactivity and LiveData. DS usually refers to UserInterfaces.

DS must be used carefully to avoid pereceived unresponsiveness. DS is especially useful for:
    * when the machine is idle
    * for long tasks
    * ContinuousInitialization tasks
    * unattended tasks
    * Machines with tasks from [Outsourcing]
